results.title: "Effect of local application of simvastatin in bone regeneration of peri-apical defects-a clinico-radiographic study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The present study evaluates and compares the effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@), @CHEMICAL_Durapatite @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017886 @@@Hydroxyapatite@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Durapatite @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017886 @@@HA@@@), and platelet-rich fibrin (PRF) in bone regeneration of @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010483 @@@periapical defects@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses osteoblastic expression of Cyr61 and progression of apical periodontitis through enhancement of the transcription factor Forkhead/winged helix box protein O3a.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may alleviate @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010483 @@@periapical lesions@@@ by enhancing @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_56484 @@@FoxO3a@@@ activity to suppress the synthesis of @GENE_CCN1 @GENE_16007 @@@Cyr61@@@ in osteoblasts.
